knowledge_base_info.title: FSKTM Comprehensive Knowledge Base
knowledge_base_info.description: Complete information about Faculty of Computer Science and Information Technology (FSKTM), UTHM
knowledge_base_info.optimized_for: AI Chatbot RAG System - Students & Lecturers

quick_answers.what_is_fsktm: FSKTM is an acronym for Faculty of Computer Science and Information Technology in Malay: Fakulti Sains Komputer dan Teknologi Maklumat
quick_answers.address: 86400 Parit Raja, Batu Pahat, Johor, Malaysia

official_name.english: Faculty of Computer Science and Information Technology
official_name.malay: Fakulti Sains Komputer dan Teknologi Maklumat

faculty_identity.vision: To be a global technical university in sustainable technology and transportation.
faculty_identity.mission: Provide technical solution for industry and community based on tauhidic paradigm.
faculty_identity.education_philosophy: UTHM education and training, founded on the tauhidic paradigm, strive to produce competent, professional and entrepreneurial graduates, driven by advanced technologies for global development.
faculty_identity.strategic_direction: UTHM as a Global Technopreneur University 2030 (#GTU2030)

establishment_history.milestone: Started as Department of Information Technology and Multimedia (JTMM), part of Faculty of Engineering Technology at KUiTTHO
Elevated to Faculty of Information Technology and Multimedia (FTMM) at Parit Raja City Campus
Rebranded to Faculty of Computer Science and Information Technology (FSKTM) with 4 new departments

departments.name: Department of Software Engineering
departments.focus_area: Software development, engineering practices, project management

departments.name: Department of Multimedia
departments.focus_area: Digital media, graphics, animation, multimedia computing

departments.name: Department of Information Security and Web Technology

programs.title: Bachelor of Computer Science (Information Security) With Honours
Bachelor of Computer Science (Multimedia Computing) With Honours
Bachelor of Computer Science (Software Engineering) With Honours
Bachelor of Computer Science (Web Technology) With Honours
Bachelor of Information Technology With Honours
Master of Information Technology by Coursework
Master of Computer Science (Software Engineering) by Mixed Mode
Master of Computer Science (Information Security) by Mixed Mode
Master of Information Technology by Research
Doctor of Philosophy in Information Technology

centers.name: Artificial Intelligence And Data Mining Centre
centers.focus: AI algorithms, machine learning, data analytics, predictive modeling

centers.name: Center of Intelligent and Autonomous Systems
centers.focus: Robotics, autonomous vehicles, intelligent control systems

centers.name: Centre For Cybersecurity And Data Intelligence
centers.focus: Cybersecurity, digital forensics, threat intelligence, secure systems

groups.name: Web Science and Technology
groups.focus: Web technologies, semantic web, web analytics

groups.name: Smart Multimedia & Cyber-Reality
groups.focus: Virtual reality, augmented reality, multimedia systems

groups.name: Applied Information System
groups.focus: Information systems, business intelligence, ERP systems

groups.name: Software Testing Research Group
groups.focus: Software testing, quality assurance, test automation

main_office.address: Faculty of Computer Science and Information Technology, Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia (UTHM), 86400 Parit Raja, Batu Pahat, Johor, Malaysia

frequently_asked_questions.question: What is FSKTM?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: FSKTM is an acronym for Faculty of Computer Science and Information Technology in Malay: Fakulti Sains Komputer dan Teknologi Maklumat

frequently_asked_questions.question: When was FSKTM established?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: The faculty started in September 2000 as JTMM, became FTMM in May 2004, and was rebranded to FSKTM on 24 August 2010.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How do I contact FSKTM?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Phone: +607 453 3606, Email: fsktm@uthm.edu.my, Address: 86400 Parit Raja, Batu Pahat, Johor, Malaysia
